Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who need to talk to each other over a long distance.
The student can design and draw a device that allows the students to communicate using sound, such as a string telephone.
The student can show how the device uses materials provided, like cups and string, to send and receive sound.
The student can illustrate that the device is meant to solve the problem of communication over a distance.
The student can label the drawing to show how sound travels from one student to another.
The student can depict the importance of communicating over long distances using devices.
